abstract: Joseph Epstein reviews books The Magnificent Medills: Americas Royal Family of Journalism During a Century of Turbulent Splendor by Megan McKinney and Newspaper Titan: The Infamous Life and Monumental Times of Cissy Patterson by Amanda Smith.
snippet: Megan McKinney’s “Magnificent Medills” and Amanda Smith’s “Newspaper Titan” chronicle the escapades of Joseph Medill and the power and zaniness of his prominent press family.
lead_paragraph: Megan McKinney’s “Magnificent Medills” and Amanda Smith’s “Newspaper Titan” chronicle the escapades of Joseph Medill and the power and zaniness of his prominent press family.
